name: compliance-pack
description: Compliance policy pack for data validation

policies.name: Required Fields Policy
policies.description: Ensures all Persons have required fields

rules.query: PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/> ASK { NOT EXISTS { ?p a schema:Person . FILTER NOT EXISTS { ?p schema:name ?n } } }
rules.message: All Persons must have a name

rules.query: PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/> ASK { NOT EXISTS { ?p a schema:Person . FILTER NOT EXISTS { ?p schema:email ?e } } }
rules.message: All Persons must have an email

rules.query: PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/> ASK { NOT EXISTS { ?p schema:email ?e . FILTER (!CONTAINS(str(?e), "@")) } }
